"Oh, <%me>!<br>What's up, amazed to<br>f:
"The situation with our universe
is stable. That's why, while we
still have time, I thought I'd
explore around here."

"I've read the reports about how
the situation here keeps getting
bigger. A full scale confrontation
is a likely possibility."

"But that won't mean a thing if
I, a symbol of ARKS, can do anything
about it, using my full strength!"

"Though, I don't feel any differences:
there seems to be no issues regarding the
atmosphere and gravity; I'm sure anyone could
go full out in this place."

"Of course, if we can go without fighting,
then that would be our best case scenario.
HAHAHAHA!"

"Huey, <%me>!
I apologize, but there's an emergency!"

"I've detected a large ether reading,
close to your location. I ask of you
both, to investigate immediately."

"This reading ...
It might be a Phantom creation
similar to a Dark Falz-type enemy!
Please investigate immediately!"

"Give us a break...
Is this what they call,
\"Speaking of the Devil\"?"
"The readings emanate from up ahead!"

"I...have arrived!
While I don't know what's going on,
but when Huey is here, everything will be-"

".. O-hey Xiera.
I thought you said it was here?"

"Uh, huh? There was definitely readings,
... but they're starting to fade ..."

"I was following a presence I thought was
powerful, however this was all it had.
Such a turn-off."
"Oh, that's <%me> over there."

"Did that happen to be your prey,
by any chance? I apologize for taking
your kill."

"Although, it didn't put up much resistance.
And I feel unsatisfied still."

"For return empty handed, ... it's not good
for both of us either, isn't that right?"
"Oh?"

"Hey, hey, hey ...
You're feisty one, right!"

"Such absurd strength, and reflexes ...
I see, you're that \"demon,\" everyone is
referring to on that report, aren't you?"

"For you, to have stopped my attack.
As expected from the rumored Council of Six."

"You don't seem to be the type
who would back down."

"Yes, as I said earlier. I'm not satisfied
yet. So, even for a short while, would
you mind entertaining me?"
"TEST"
